programmes.show_description: How news bulletins used to look. The GREAT! network takes you back in time, remembering stories from this week back then.
High-octane thriller starring Sam Worthington. An assassin hired to kill a young woman ends up falling for her instead. Together, they team up to avenge her father's death (2017).
The Baron is tricked into looking over a deal between the King of Ammak and a millionaire to buy some of the Ammak crown jewels.
Can Steed and Peel prove their innocence when they are implicated in the deaths of foreign agents? Stars Patrick Macnee and Diana Rigg.
Join officers from New Zealand Police as they patrol the streets and race to the scene of real-life emergency calls.
Contemporary western with Tom Berenger, Luke Perry and Burt Reynolds. Three brothers are pulled into a fiery conflict between old cowboys and new homesteaders. (1/2) (2002).
An uplifting round-up of good news stories from the UK and around the world.

Geronimo's chief warrior Manatou stages attacks on innocents, jeopardising truce talks with the army. Hollister uses a specially equipped stagecoach to trap Manatou.

Epitaph editor Claibourne believes outlaw Nate Storm has been living in Tombstone under an assumed name. Two residents become the prime suspects after Hollister uncovers strange clues.
An injured Hollister goes to the Travers ranch in Tucson to recover. Ed Keel is out for revenge for the hanging of his brother hoping to take advantage of an off his guard Clay's injuries.
Western starring Gary Cooper. On a mission to Mexico, a cowardly army major is asked to transport soldiers praised for bravery. But along the way, they reveal their true nature (1959).
